PokerProject

Class Card

  • Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends Object
    Class Card represents each one of the 52 cards from the Deck.

    Each object has two Integer attributes:

    • value - index from array values that represents the value of the card;
    • suit - index from array suits that represents the suit of the card.

    They correspond to indexes of two final and static arrays of String:

    • values = {A, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, T, J, Q, K};
    • suits = {C, D, H, S}.
